title: Meteor Mining Colony Adventure #43
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Crew Quarters
rooms.description: A cramped living space with metal bunks bolted to the walls. Red emergency lights cast an ominous glow. Through the porthole window, you see the barren surface of the meteor and distant stars. The air recycler hums weakly. Warning klaxons echo from somewhere in the colony.

items.name: personal storage locker
items.description: A metal locker with two compartments and a digital lock panel

items.name: crew assignment manifest
items.description: A digital tablet showing crew assignments and schedules
items.text: CREW MANIFEST - Colony Station M2187. Chief Engineer: Marcus Chen. Medical Officer: Dr Sarah Patel. Mining Supervisor: James Rodriguez. Remember: Emergency protocols require knowledge of crew roles and locations.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled Security Level 2

items.name: metal bunk bed
items.description: A sturdy bunk with storage underneath

items.name: personal datapad
items.description: A small tablet with personal notes and messages
items.text: Personal Log: The colony was established in year 2187. Chief Engineer Chen is brilliant but keeps the reactor codes to himself. Dr Patel mentioned the medical bay has emergency supplies. Rodriguez oversees all mining operations in the excavation zone.

items.name: emergency cryopod
items.description: A sealed cryogenic sleep pod for emergencies, currently locked

items.name: emergency survival kit
items.description: A kit containing basic survival supplies and a maintenance tool

items.name: reinforced door
items.description: A heavy door leading to the main corridor, secured with a keycard reader

rooms.name: Main Corridor
rooms.description: A long metal corridor with flickering overhead lights. Warning signs line the walls. Display screens show various colony systems in critical status. To the east is the medical bay, and to the west is the control room. The shuttle bay access is at the far end.

items.name: display showing Chief Chen
items.description: A memorial display with a photo and information plaque
items.text: Chief Engineer Marcus Chen - Responsible for reactor maintenance, life support systems, and power distribution. Station hero and technical genius.

items.name: display showing Dr Patel
items.description: A memorial display honoring the medical officer
items.text: Dr Sarah Patel - Medical Officer. Maintained crew health and managed the medical bay supplies. Known for her dedication to crew welfare.

items.name: display showing Supervisor Rodriguez
items.description: A display commemorating the mining supervisor
items.text: James Rodriguez - Mining Supervisor. Oversaw all excavation operations and mineral extraction in the mining zone. Expert in asteroid geology.

items.name: emergency access panel
items.description: A wall panel with emergency supplies and documentation

items.name: evacuation protocol document
items.description: Official emergency evacuation procedures
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of colony emergency, proceed to shuttle bay. Access requires security clearance. Questions verify identity: Who maintains the reactor? Where are medical supplies kept? Where does mining occur?

items.name: medical bay door
items.description: A door marked with a red cross symbol, leading east

items.name: shuttle bay access door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the shuttle bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who maintains the reactor?
password_questions.hint: Check the crew manifest and memorial displays

password_questions.question: Where are medical supplies kept?
password_questions.hint: Look at the evacuation protocol and crew assignments

rooms.name: Medical Bay
rooms.description: A sterile white room with medical equipment and supply cabinets. Examination tables line one wall. A large medicine cabinet dominates the back wall. The air smells of antiseptic.

items.name: locked medicine cabinet
items.description: A secure cabinet containing medical supplies and important documents

items.name: medical officer log
items.description: Dr Patel's personal medical log and notes
items.text: Medical Log - Dr Sarah Patel: Crew health remains stable. Note: Chief Chen requested I keep backup reactor codes in case of emergency. Code sequence matches colony founding year: 2187. All supplies properly stored in medical bay as per protocol.

items.name: medical examination table
items.description: A standard examination table with storage drawers

items.name: first aid kit
items.description: Basic medical supplies for emergencies

rooms.name: Emergency Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: A large hangar containing a small emergency shuttle. The shuttle's engines glow with ready power. Through the massive bay doors, you can see the starfield beyond. A control console blinks with green ready lights. This is your way home!

items.name: emergency escape shuttle
items.description: A compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, fueled and ready for launch

items.name: shuttle launch console
items.description: The control panel for launching the shuttle, showing all systems green

items.name: observation window
items.description: A large reinforced window showing the meteor surface and the vast expanse of space beyond

rooms.win_message: You board the emergency shuttle and initiate the launch sequence. The engines roar to life as the bay doors open to space. The shuttle lifts off, leaving the doomed mining colony behind. You set course for the nearest space station, safe at last. You win!
